text:
Hello everyone! I'm Anant Thazhemadam, and I'm applying for GSoC'21.
I've got a fair draft of my proposal ready, and would really appreciate it if anyone here would be kind enough to take a couple of minutes to review my proposal, and give me any pointers on how it could be better (or what you think about it, and any feedback, really).
You can check out my proposal <https://docs.google.com/document/d/12Hsez0D2XUamYDYBzn1Ij2s-cFam41GsuLo_OxTpKec/edit?usp=sharing|here>! Thank you. :smile:

text: By all means, be as critical and brutal as you could be with any criticisms, suggestions or feedback, please!
